mapper.select: SELECT activity_id AS activityId, venue_id AS venueId, court_id AS courtId, activity_type_id AS activityTypeId, activity_type_desc AS activityTypeDesc, activity_name AS activityName, activity_date AS activityDate, start_time AS startTime, end_time AS endTime, max_participants AS maxParticipants, current_participants AS currentParticipants, unit_price AS unitPrice, description, registration_deadline AS registrationDeadline, organizer_id AS organizerId, organizer_type AS organizerType, min_ntrp_level AS minNtrpLevel, activity_config AS activityConfig, created_at AS createdAt, updated_at AS updatedAt FROM venue_activity WHERE venue_id = #{venueId} AND DATE(activity_date) = #{activityDate} ORDER BY start_time ASC
